verbose_text: XBP1s orchestrates UPR signaling by inducing the expression of genes which involve ER protein folding, secretion, phospholipid biosynthesis, ER expansion, and ER associated protein degradation (ERAD).
evidence: expression of genes which involve ER protein folding, secretion, phospholipid biosynthesis, ER expansion, and ER-associated protein degradation (ERAD
